channel.title: Posts on facundo.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on facundo.dev

item.title: Code generation is your friend
item.author: facundo@protonmail.com (Facundo Medica)
item.description: As software developers we need to perform several tasks at the same time, but mainly coding, writing documentation and writing tests. And for every feature our current project requires we'll perform, to a greater or lesser extent, all of these three things. So we can deduce that if we reduce the time spent in any of these activities we are then reducing the time that it takes our team to finish a feature.

item.title: Remove all Docker images and containers
item.author: facundo@protonmail.com (Facundo Medica)
item.description: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) docker rmi $(docker images -a -q)

item.title: AES-GCM encryption in Go
item.author: facundo@protonmail.com (Facundo Medica)
item.description:
Somehow I ended up using AES-GCM at least once per week, so I'm tired of googling the same thing over and over. Here's a working example extracted from the book Build a web application with Golang.

Note: the key should be 32 bytes result of a safe hash function like SHA256.

Go Playground

item.title: Simple HTTP Server
item.author: facundo@protonmail.com (Facundo Medica)
item.description: Serve an entire directory easily with Python. python -m SimpleHTTPServer python3 -m http.server

item.title: First Post
item.author: facundo@protonmail.com (Facundo Medica)
item.description: This is my second blog ever (maybe I'll write about my first one someday). This time in a “knowledge base” format, meaning that a full post could be just a snippet of code or a 100 paragraph story.
